encode 0 bytes.desc: Ensure a helpful error message is thrown when attempting to encode 0 bytes

malformed bytes.desc: Ensure a helpful error message is thrown when attempting to decode malformed bytes

Invalid type.desc: Ensure a helpful error message is thrown when giving the wrong type to a field

Transaction Tests.desc: Tests that apply to all transaction types

encode.desc: A transaction with valid fields is encoded properly

encode with signature.desc: A signature can be attached to a encoded transaction

encode with auth address.desc: An auth address can be attached to a encoded transaction with a signature

decode with prefix.desc: A transaction with TX prefix and valid fields is decoded properly

decode without prefix.desc: A transaction without TX prefix and valid fields is decoded properly

decode signed transaction.desc: A transaction with a valid signature is decoded properly

get encoded transaction type.desc: The transaction type of an encoded transaction can be retrieved

get transaction id.desc: A transaction id can be obtained from a transaction

example.desc: A human-readable example of forming a transaction and signing it

multisig example.desc: A human-readable example of forming a transaction and signing it with a multisignature sig

assign fee.desc: A fee can be calculated and assigned to a transaction

Transaction Group Tests.desc: Tests that apply to collections of transactions

group transactions.desc: A collection of transactions can be grouped

encode transactions.desc: A collection of transactions can be encoded

encode signed transactions.desc: A collection of signed transactions can be encoded
